subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Money Laundering
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: A tattoo parlor owner whose purchase of Ohio State football memorabilia led to an N.C.A.A. investigation of the program pleaded guilty to drug-trafficking and money-laundering charges.
snippet: A tattoo parlor owner whose purchase of Ohio State football memorabilia led to an N.C.A.A. investigation of the program pleaded guilty to drug-trafficking and money-laundering charges.
